metadata.title: CVE-2020-28163 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libdwarf before 20201201 allows a dwarf_print_lines.c NULL pointerdereference and application crash via a DWARF5 line-table header that hasan invalid FORM for a pathname.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
